posts.postText: I don't like the non-NNJG people coming to our server just to watch YouTube videos. They don't take interest in joining our community when they come to the server and I doubt they ever will. If they want to join us they can take the time to join our forums and sign up for it.

I say we just ban whoever we don't like.

This is not a democracy, people forget we can do whatever we want.
I like the way you think Quack
what if im not liked D:?
Or one of the theaters can be only for nnjg members

>> there's only one theater server :ll 


He means one of the THEATERS in the server. There's more than one, you know.
Oh I see.. Alright then that would be a nice idea
Too much work to get all those steamids
people can post there steam ID's here if they would like to be in that theater room...?
